description: A minimal Android native Kotlin application template that integrates with AgentforceSDK for service agents. This template provides a foundation for building Android apps that enable service agents to have conversations with customers using Jetpack Compose and the AgentforceSDK.
useCase: Use this template when you need to create a minimal Android native app for service agents that integrates with AgentforceSDK. It's ideal for developers who want a simple starting point for building agent-facing applications with chat and conversation capabilities.

customizationPoints.description: Configure AgentforceSDK settings including ES developer name, organization ID, and API URL
instructions: Update Settings.kt with your ES developer name, organization ID, API URL, and agent ID
Update CredentialProvider.kt with your credential handling logic

customizationPoints.description: Customize the Jetpack Compose interface and chat experience
instructions: Modify HomeScreen.kt to customize the home screen UI
Modify ChatScreen.kt to customize the chat UI
Update AgentforceViewModel.kt to add custom state management

customizationPoints.description: Customize credential provider and authentication flow
instructions: Update CredentialProvider.kt to implement your authentication mechanism
Modify MainApplication.kt for custom app initialization
Configure credential refresh logic if needed
Add custom authentication UI if required

developerName.description: ES developer name from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration

organizationId.description: Organization ID from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration

apiURL.description: API URL from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration

agentId.description: Agent ID from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration
